nodes.text: Skuun was the timid Peasle female assistant to space traffic controller Milon Thakkery aboard a space traffic control satellite above the planet Valo. During the Republic Fair hosted on the planet, Skuun reported the details of the accidental explosion of a cruiser carrying Jinda dancers. Shortly afterward, Valo was attacked by Nihil marauders, who destroyed the space station, killing Skuun and everyone aboard.
